scene.name: Binder clip setup
scene.description: A desk with a binder clip and a document bag

task.name: Use binder clip
task.description: Pick up clip, attach to file bag, remove, and return to desk
task.spoken_prompt: Task: We will use a binder clip. The goal is to clip the document bag and then remove the clip.
task.spoken_prompt_cn: 任务描述：我们要使用蝴蝶夹。目标是用它夹住文件袋，然后再取下来。

subtasks.description: Execute the clipping and unclipping sequence
subtasks.spoken_prompt: Subtask: Please clip the file bag and then remove the clip.
subtasks.spoken_prompt_cn: 子任务描述：请夹住文件袋，然后再把夹子取下来。

steps.spoken_prompt: Step one: pick up the binder clip from the desk.
steps.spoken_prompt_cn: 第一步：拿起桌上的蝴蝶夹。

steps.description: Press the clip open and attach it to the bag seal
steps.spoken_prompt: Step two: press the handles to open the clip and attach it to the seal of the document bag.
steps.spoken_prompt_cn: 第二步：按压长尾打开夹口，夹住文件袋的封口。

steps.description: Press the clip open and remove it from the bag
steps.spoken_prompt: Step three: press the handles again to open the clip and remove it from the bag.
steps.spoken_prompt_cn: 第三步：再次按压长尾打开夹口，把蝴蝶夹取下来。

steps.description: Place the binder clip back on the desk
steps.spoken_prompt: Step four: place the binder clip back on the desk.
steps.spoken_prompt_cn: 第四步：把蝴蝶夹放回桌面上。

constraints.notes: Requires finger strength to press the clip open; ensure the clip is securely attached in step 2 before removing.
